channel.title: Hosting my server
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm looking to host my own server and I wanted to know something. Basically, I have 50mb web space and I want to know if I could upload my server to web space, and be able to get people online using it? I don't really want to pay for a dedicated server, but if there is no other way of using this web space, I will have to. I don't want to use hamachi. If anyone knows how I could do this, please post.
Many thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Hosting my server
item.dc:creator: @elemenation_2 elemenation 2
item.description:
@elemenation_2 wrote:

he means he wants to use a webhost to host his server… Syrillia, this would be hard you would have to hack… and anyway if you dont want to host it just post a subject saying “Need host!”. you might want to give a reward so peps will actualy do it too… also 50Mbs wont do it… u will need atleast 250MBs cause my server files take up 400MBs and i only have 10,000 peps who play…

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting my server
item.dc:creator: @adamator5 adamator5
item.description:
@adamator5 wrote:

i dont know, but usually u port forward so
go to
start, run and then type in cmd, then when the bat file loads up, type ipconfig, then it shud come up with your ethernet adapter, and the ip that is there, type that in the adress bar, and then click etc. virtual servers, port forwarding (depends what router you have)
cya!

Read full topic
